meanings.definition: The act or process of making a map.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the mapping of new places in my geography class.
meanings.sent2: The mapping of the city helped us find our way around easily.
meanings.sent3: The mapping of the treasure hunt made it more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a mapping tool, organizing thoughts like a map.
meanings.sent5: The mapping of the stars in the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A representation of an area, usually on a flat surface.
meanings.sent1: The mapping on the globe showed the world's continents.
meanings.sent2: I used the mapping on the paper to draw the neighborhood layout.
meanings.sent3: The mapping on the tablecloth looked like a city from above.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was a mapping of emotions on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The mapping on the screen displayed the terrain beautifully.

meanings.definition: The assignment of something to a particular category or classification.
meanings.sent1: The mapping of colors to numbers helped in the art project.
meanings.sent2: In biology, the mapping of organisms is crucial for research.
meanings.sent3: The mapping of desserts to fruits was a fun game at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a mapping of emotions, each tone a different category.
meanings.sent5: The mapping of books to genres made the library easy to navigate.
